item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

shorttext.p: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: The guys are stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonard's car is stolen on the way to the Bakersfield Comic-Con. Back home, the girls try to figure out why the guys are so fascinated with comic books.

shorttext.p: The guys are stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonard's car is stolen on the way to the Bakersfield Comic-Con. Back home, the girls try to figure out why the guys are so fascinated with comic books.

item.title: The Good Wife
item.description: As Diane prepares for big changes as she leaves the firm, the firm faces a politically-motivated sexual harassment suit. Meanwhile, Jackie makes trouble for the inauguration, and Alicia and Cary's departure from the firm is imminent.

shorttext.p: As Diane prepares for big changes as she leaves the firm, the firm faces a politically-motivated sexual harassment suit. Meanwhile, Jackie makes trouble for the inauguration, and Alicia and Cary's departure from the firm is imminent.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

shorttext.p: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

item.description: Evidence links Jack Bauer to a dastardly assassination. In order to prevent a war with Russia, the White House orders a trade of Jack's nephew for the circuit board, and puts Jack in custody so he cannot stop the exchange.

shorttext.p: Evidence links Jack Bauer to a dastardly assassination. In order to prevent a war with Russia, the White House orders a trade of Jack's nephew for the circuit board, and puts Jack in custody so he cannot stop the exchange.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

shorttext.p: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

item.description: The President meets with Jonas Hodges while Jack battles toxins in his body and works with someone inside the Starkwood compound: can they destroy the bio-weapons before rockets rain death on U.S. cities?

shorttext.p: The President meets with Jonas Hodges while Jack battles toxins in his body and works with someone inside the Starkwood compound: can they destroy the bio-weapons before rockets rain death on U.S. cities?

item.title: Da Vinci's Demons
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 7: The Vault of Heaven
item.description: Clarice's life is in danger. The fellowship enters the Vault of Heaven, which holds many mysteries and deceptions. Lucrezia reaches her destination, meeting someone along the way. Zoroaster and Nico plan their escape.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 7: The Vault of Heaven

Clarice's life is in danger. The fellowship enters the Vault of Heaven, which holds many mysteries and deceptions. Lucrezia reaches her destination, meeting someone along the way. Zoroaster and Nico plan their escape.

item.title: Da Vinci's Demons
item.description: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and breaks into the Vatican through the sewer. He meets the Pope and the mysterious prisoner. Giuliano reveals the identity of spy in Rome. Later, the search for the Medici's spy intensifies.

shorttext.p: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and breaks into the Vatican through the sewer. He meets the Pope and the mysterious prisoner. Giuliano reveals the identity of spy in Rome. Later, the search for the Medici's spy intensifies.

item.title: Shameless
item.series: Season 3, Ep. 7: A Long Way from Home
item.description: Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, while Fiona starts a new job and a new romance.

shorttext.p: Season 3, Ep. 7: A Long Way from Home
Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, while Fiona starts a new job and a new romance.

item.title: Pretty Little Liars
item.description: With the events of New York behind them, the Liars are unsettled to still be living under a cloud of secrets. Aria is haunted by the recent past events, while Emily and Spencer try to wrap their head around the new normal.

shorttext.p: With the events of New York behind them, the Liars are unsettled to still be living under a cloud of secrets. Aria is haunted by the recent past events, while Emily and Spencer try to wrap their head around the new normal.

item.title: Glee
item.description: Nervous for opening night, Rachel is willing to do anything to succeed. When she finds out that Jacob Ben Isreal is writing a review of the show for the New Yorker, her director pressures her to do whatever it takes for a good review.

shorttext.p: Nervous for opening night, Rachel is willing to do anything to succeed. When she finds out that Jacob Ben Isreal is writing a review of the show for the New Yorker, her director pressures her to do whatever it takes for a good review.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Hank asks Walt to drive him to the laundry where the meth lab is hidden. Ted still won't pay the IRS so Skyler asks Saul for help, and Saul sends in his A-Team. Gus and Jesse return from Mexico, and Walt fears he is in trouble with Gus.

shorttext.p: Hank asks Walt to drive him to the laundry where the meth lab is hidden. Ted still won't pay the IRS so Skyler asks Saul for help, and Saul sends in his A-Team. Gus and Jesse return from Mexico, and Walt fears he is in trouble with Gus.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

shorttext.p: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

item.title: Orange Is the New Black
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change
item.description: The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change

The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

item.title: Pretty Little Liars
item.description: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

shorttext.p: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

item.title: Grimm
item.description: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.

shorttext.p: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relationship?

shorttext.p: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relationship?

item.title: Gotham
item.description: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

shorttext.p: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

item.title: The Good Wife
item.series: Season 4, Ep. 21: A More Perfect Union
item.description: Alicia's case involving at-will employees trying to unionize sparks a possible mutiny at Lockhart Gardner. Meanwhile, Peter gives Alicia an opportunity to renew their wedding vows, but he also needs her help on the campaign.

shorttext.p: Season 4, Ep. 21: A More Perfect Union

Alicia's case involving at-will employees trying to unionize sparks a possible mutiny at Lockhart Gardner. Meanwhile, Peter gives Alicia an opportunity to renew their wedding vows, but he also needs her help on the campaign.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: A desperate Bill tries to ferry Warlow away from the faerie plain, but Sookie is having none of it. Meanwhile, Eric arrives at vamp camp, looking to inflict serious human damage. Bill feels the pull of Lilith's sirens.

shorttext.p: A desperate Bill tries to ferry Warlow away from the faerie plain, but Sookie is having none of it. Meanwhile, Eric arrives at vamp camp, looking to inflict serious human damage. Bill feels the pull of Lilith's sirens.

item.title: Outlander
item.description: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.

shorttext.p: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

shorttext.p: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 5: The Wolf and the Lion
item.description: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at The Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 5: The Wolf and the Lion

Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at The Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

item.title: The 100
item.description: Joy's baby daddy, Simon (Craig Ferguson), meets his son and grandson for the very first time as they pretend to be a happy family to get Wilbur into a prestigious pre-school. Melanie and Elka try to find the perfect doctor.

shorttext.p: Joy's baby daddy, Simon (Craig Ferguson), meets his son and grandson for the very first time as they pretend to be a happy family to get Wilbur into a prestigious pre-school. Melanie and Elka try to find the perfect doctor.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

shorttext.p: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

item.title: Revolution
item.description: Empowered with authority by the President, Truman launches a mustard gas attack to kill Miles and Monroe. To Rachel's disappointment, Miles agrees to join Monroe in a ruthless plot to beat the Patriots at their own game.

shorttext.p: Empowered with authority by the President, Truman launches a mustard gas attack to kill Miles and Monroe. To Rachel's disappointment, Miles agrees to join Monroe in a ruthless plot to beat the Patriots at their own game.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

shorttext.p: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

item.title: The Following
item.description: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

shorttext.p: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

shorttext.p: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

item.description: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relationship?
